questions.question: I am confident …………………….. I will win.
questions.description: We use that to introduce a noun clause.

questions.question: ……………………….. she heard the news, she fainted.
questions.description: As soon as is used to connect two actions that happen in quick succession.

questions.question: He worked diligently ………………………….. he could build a successful business.
…………………………. he does not arrive on time, we will go without him.
questions.description: We use if to express a condition.

questions.question: He died in the village ……………………….. he was born.
questions.description: We can use where to introduce adverb clauses of place.

questions.question: The children were not fully prepared ……………………….. they delivered a splendid performance.
questions.description: We use but to connect two contrasting ideas.

questions.question: She earns more ……………………….. him.
questions.description: We use than after a comparative expression.

questions.question: …………………………. you start now, you will be able to catch the first bus.
………………………… he apologizes, we will not take him back.
questions.description: Unless is similar to if not.

questions.question: She is a kind woman ……………………… everybody respects.
The child started crying …………………………. he was hungry.
